24-805.Judicial nominating commissions; members serve on more than one commission; residency requirements.

In conformity with the residency requirements of section 24-802, individual lawyer or citizen members of any judicial nominating commission may serve on more than one judicial nominating commission at the same time.

SourceLaws 1963, c. 124, ยง 5, p. 473;Laws 1974, LB 785, ยง 5;Laws 2025, LB388, ยง 3.Effective Date: September 3, 2025
